section.p: You can move student profile from one subdivision to another while editing their profile (see ) or when restoring that student from the archive (see ) by selecting a new subdivision from the drop down list.

fig.title: Drop down list of school subdivisions

image.alt: Drop down list of school subdivisions

section.note: While editing a student profile, their associated subdivision is automatically selected from the drop down box.
You can easily move student profiles to a different subdivision branch in the tree view panel (see ) using drag and drop ( ).
